body.bibl: Odisho, Edward Y. “Aspiration, Spirantization and Approximation in Neo-Aramaic: A More Refined Identification.” In Loquentes Linguis: Studi Linguistici e Orientali in Onore Di Fabrizio A. Pennacchietti = Linguistic and Oriental Studies in Honour of Fabrizio A. Pennacchietti = Lingvistikaj Kaj Orientaj Studoj Honore al Fabrizio A. Pennacchietti, edited by Pier Giorgio Borbone, Alessandro Mengozzi, and Mauro Tosco, 555–64. Wiesbaden: Harrassowitz Verlag, 2006.
